pages.text: Elemental Oils are essential crafting components in witchcraft. They are made out of a type of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/bark)Bark$() and other components.$(br2)To craft a few bottles of oil, first throw a piece of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/bark)Bark$() into a boiling $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron)Witch Caulron$(), then add the other ingredients. Once it reaches a pleasant, matching color, you can bottle it.
Cleansing Balm is associated with light, and is just as bright.
Associated with the principle of darkness, Grim Elixir is dark, like blood.
Aqua Cerate is blue, like water.$(br2)Any type of Fish may be used for this.
Fiery Serum is a bright orange. It incorporates the principle of the flame.

Heaven extract is completely white and represents air.$(br2)Be careful not to throw the $(l:bewitchment:introduction/crops)Mandrake Root$() in first, or you might accidentally create a $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)Brew$().
